text: Soni tungasache tunganyyakwile (pa uchimbichimbi) ni gele (ma Ayago), nambo kuti jwalakwe jwapendechele ku duniya ni kuya isako yakwe, basi chilandanyo chakwe chili chisawu mbwa janti nkujikalipilamo jikasapumasika (pakutiila) mwakoposya lulimi, natamuno kujileka (ngajikalipila) jikasapumasikape mwakoposya lulimi, chele ni chilandanyo cha wandu awala waakaaniile ma Aya Getu, basi siimbaani ngani kuti wanganyao achetelele
